p: The cryo-EM density maps for the EV-A71 virus and the two virus-complexes are available at the Electron Microscopy Data Bank via accession codes EMD-7905 (sharpened and unsharpened virus maps) and EMD-7913 (sharpened and unsharpened virus-MADAL385 complex maps). The atomic coordinates for the viruses built in the two maps are available at the PDB via accession codes 6DIJ (virus) and 6DIZ (virus-drug complex).
